Geometry_KG.description: This KG provides reasoning for geometric problems by parsing queries for shapes and properties and mapping them to formal representations.

agents.name: AreaCalculatorAgent
agents.description: Calculates the area of a rectangle given its width and height.
agents.groovyScript: class AreaCalculatorAgent { def generateCandidate(dimensions) { return dimensions.width * dimensions.height } }

metadata.description: Processes geometric queries and validates shape properties.
